availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John N. Teeter (Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Garrard County, Kentucky, farmer. Garrard County native. Son of Nelson Teeter and Permelia Teeter. Married to Margaret Burton Teeter in Garrard County on September 15, 1859. Farmer in Garrard County in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records (Provost Marshal General's Bureau; Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865), NARA RG 110, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), Consolidated Enrollment Lists, 1863-1865 (Civil War Union Draft Records), Garrard County, KY, July 1863, p. 355, (Accessed via ancestry.com).
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records – Microfilm (1852-1910), KDLA, Roll #994059, Garrard County Marriages, p. unknown.
Vital Statistics Original Death Certificates – Microfilm (1911-1964), KDLA, Roll #7016222, Garrard County Deaths, file #25232.
